package.description:
This is a port of the older ROS driver for SR devices that used the libusb API. This driver uses the newer libmesasr API (>= 1.0) that can be found at http://www.mesa-imaging.ch/drivers.php. This node is designed to work with the ROS image_pipeline with minimal dependencies.
Note: A compile time flag at the top of include/swissranger.h is currently used to switch back and forth between supporting SR3000 and SR4000 devices.
